short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension gives you best compliments from Good News Buddy, the popular TikTok account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your mood every day with the Compliments from Good News Buddy extension!

This lightweight and easy-to-use extension provides you with a unique, uplifting compliment each time you open a new tab. It's designed to add a touch of positivity to your day, no matter what you're going through.

Here's what you can expect from this extension:
- A fresh, random compliment every time you click on the extension icon.
- A simple and clean interface that won't distract from your browsing.
- No unnecessary permissions â€“ your data stays private.

Version 1.1 updates:
- I have added more compliments so you will not see the same compliments as much!
